name: User is able to trigger builds remotely with a valid Authentication Token.
description: Enabling the Builds remotely trigger of a Freestyle Project allows the user to remotely trigger builds via the Jenkins API using a valid Authentication Token.
descriptionHtml: Enabling the Builds remotely trigger of a Freestyle Project allows the user to remotely trigger builds via the Jenkins API using a valid Authentication Token.

beforeStages.name: Set up config from context for test session.
Clear Jenkins data before each test run.

steps.name: Clean up Jenkins data.
Delete all existing jobs and views for the user session.
Extract Jenkins crumb token from HTML response.

parameters.name: config
parameters.value: Config(browser=BrowserConfig(NAME='chrome', OPTIONS_CHROME='--remote-allow-origins=*;--disable-gpu;--no-sandbox;--disable-dev-shm-usage;--headless=new;--window-size=1920,1080', OPTIONS_EDGE='--window-size=1920,1080'), jenkins=JenkinsConfig(HOST='localhost', PORT='8080', USERNAME='admin', PASSWORD='e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a', base_url='http://localhost:8080', login_url='http://localhost:8080/j_spring_security_check', login_data={'j_username': 'admin', 'j_password': 'e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a'}, crumb='', current_username=''))

beforeStages.name: Configure WebDriver with options and save failure screenshot.
Launch browser and open the Login Page.
Log in with valid credentials and open the Jenkins Main Page.

steps.name: Login with credentials
Fetch and update Jenkins CSRF crumb token.
Create requests session using Selenium WebDriver cookies.

parameters.name: config
parameters.value: Config(browser=BrowserConfig(NAME='chrome', OPTIONS_CHROME='--remote-allow-origins=*;--disable-gpu;--no-sandbox;--disable-dev-shm-usage;--headless=new;--window-size=1920,1080', OPTIONS_EDGE='--window-size=1920,1080'), jenkins=JenkinsConfig(HOST='localhost', PORT='8080', USERNAME='admin', PASSWORD='e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a', base_url='http://localhost:8080', login_url='http://localhost:8080/j_spring_security_check', login_data={'j_username': 'admin', 'j_password': 'e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a'}, crumb='', current_username='admin'))

beforeStages.name: Precondition: Generate and temporary save a new token in the User's Security Settings.

steps.name: Go to the User page by clicking the Username in the header.
Navigate to "UserPage"
Go to the Security page by clicking the Security button.
Navigate to "SecurityPage"
Generate and copy new Token with the name "'New Freestyle Project'".
Click Add new token button.
Input token name "New Freestyle Project".
Click Generate button.
Copy token.
Save security settings.
Click Save button.
Go to User page - user "admin".
Go to the main page by clicking logo.
Navigate to "MainPage"
Generated token: "117f2a47b3fa782fcf30461c4af69b7a0a".

beforeStages.name: Navigate to the New Item Page.

steps.name: Go to the New Item Page by clicking New Item button.
Navigate to "NewItemPage"
Create new freestyle project with the name "'New Freestyle Project'".
Input project name "New Freestyle Project".
Select "Freestyle project" type.
Click "OK" button.
Go to the Freestyle Project Configuration page.

beforeStages.name: Precondition: Configure Freestyle project for remote builds and trigger execution via API.

steps.name: Enable "Trigger Builds Remotely" and save with provided token "'117f2a47b3fa782fcf30461c4af69b7a0a'".
Check "Trigger Builds Remotely" checkbox.
Input auth token "117f2a47b3fa782fcf30461c4af69b7a0a".
Save configurations.
Click Save Button and go to the Freestyle Project Page.
Go to the main page by clicking logo.
Navigate to "MainPage"
Trigger the build via API and wait for it to finish.
Trigger Jenkins job build remotely using API token.
Fetch and update Jenkins CSRF crumb token.
Create requests session using Selenium WebDriver cookies.

parameters.name: config
parameters.value: Config(browser=BrowserConfig(NAME='chrome', OPTIONS_CHROME='--remote-allow-origins=*;--disable-gpu;--no-sandbox;--disable-dev-shm-usage;--headless=new;--window-size=1920,1080', OPTIONS_EDGE='--window-size=1920,1080'), jenkins=JenkinsConfig(HOST='localhost', PORT='8080', USERNAME='admin', PASSWORD='e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a', base_url='http://localhost:8080', login_url='http://localhost:8080/j_spring_security_check', login_data={'j_username': 'admin', 'j_password': 'e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a'}, crumb='', current_username=''))

steps.name: Create requests session using Selenium WebDriver cookies.

parameters.name: config
parameters.value: Config(browser=BrowserConfig(NAME='chrome', OPTIONS_CHROME='--remote-allow-origins=*;--disable-gpu;--no-sandbox;--disable-dev-shm-usage;--headless=new;--window-size=1920,1080', OPTIONS_EDGE='--window-size=1920,1080'), jenkins=JenkinsConfig(HOST='localhost', PORT='8080', USERNAME='admin', PASSWORD='e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a', base_url='http://localhost:8080', login_url='http://localhost:8080/j_spring_security_check', login_data={'j_username': 'admin', 'j_password': 'e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a'}, crumb='', current_username=''))

steps.name: Wait for Jenkins build queue to start, finish, and clear.
Expand build queue info block if it is collapsed.
Wait for the build to start and the 'Build Queue (1)' header to appear.
Wait for the build finished and the "Build Queue" header to appear.
Wait for the message "No builds in the queue." to appear.

testStage.description: Enabling the Builds remotely trigger of a Freestyle Project allows the user to remotely trigger builds via the Jenkins API using a valid Authentication Token.

steps.name: Go to the Build History page by clicking Build History button.
Get existing builds list.
Assert that only one build is displayed in the list.
Assert that the project name of the displayed build is "New Freestyle Project".
Assert that the build has number "#1".

afterStages.name: Configure WebDriver with options and save failure screenshot.::0
